category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Rollup_Variant_Traverse_Level_Is_InstallationAssembly
preference.preference_description: Specifies the upward traverse scope up to which line roll up variant conditions needs to be calculated. This preference will be considered only when the preference "Rollup_Variant_Feature" is set to true. Valid Values: * true: The roll up variant conditions are calculated up to the Installation Assembly in the BOM structure, if it exists. Otherwise, the roll up variant conditions are calculated up to the top line of the loaded structure. * false: They are calculated up to top line of the loaded structure. This is the default value.
